document_data.name: Airsteppers Guild
document_data.mainbody: The '''Airsteppers Guild''' was a messenger [[guild]] of [[windsoul genasi]] that operated in [[Airspur]], [[Akanûl]], in the late years of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|4697}}
document_data.Activitties:
Due to the vertical nature of Airspur, travel throughout the city was challenging. However, windsoul genasi could levitate over short distances and float and thus made excellent couriers.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|4701}} Guild members wore blue and white robes and followed a strict code of secrecy.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|4710}}

As of [[1479 DR]], the Airsteppers, as they were called, were often employed by Queen [[Arathane]] and the [[Four Stewards]], usually to work as guards or decoys, as they were known for their adherence to the guild's rules, though a few individuals were corrupt enough to be hired by the Stewards [[Magnol]] and [[Myxofin]] for intel gathering.{{Cite dragon/377/Explore Airspur|66}}
document_data.Notable Members: * [[Riltana]], a windsoul [[rogue]] and companion of the [[Deva (aasimar)|deva]] [[Demascus]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies}}
